huh.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: used to show that you have not heard or understood a question
huh.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: used at the end of a question, often to ask for agreement
huh.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Not a bad little place, huh?
huh.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: used to show disagreement or surprise, or to show that you do not find something impressive
huh.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: ‘She looks nice.’ ‘Huh! Too much make-up, if you ask me.’
